name: REFERRAL_CLIN_DOC_ACNS
description: This table contains information about attachment control numbers (ACN) associated with an electronic medical prior authorization (eMPA) request for clinical documentation.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_ACN
columns.description: The unique ID of all attachment control numbers (ACN) associated with the outgoing real-time transaction (RTX) contact that submitted the document.
